author: m.kalinin
content: It, also, depends on the pruning settings. If tree pruning window is less than `1024` than it won't be possible to do a re-org. Otherwise, at least geth able to manage that, not sure about the others. In EthereumJ there was a restriction in the sync subsystem that didn't allow to do a re-org longer than `192` blocks.
